March 14, 2018

Mac下配置flutter开发环境

Get Started 安装环境: Mac OS 10.12.6 下载flutter $ git clone -b alpha https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git $ export PATH=`pwd`/flutter/bin:$PATH 按照第二步设置的环境变量只在terminal的当前session中有效，所以需要在~/.bash_profile文件中加入下行 $ export PATH=$HOME/flutter/bin:$PATH 然后执行 $ source ~/.bash_profile 重新打开terminal,输入 flutter OK 检查依赖 $ flutter...
